name: Hand of Horzasha
description: When a headstrong knight from the sealed-off human world witnesses the neglect of an orphaned child, she abandons her former life as an explorer to protect her newly adopted daughter in life-risking ritual combat in a strange town of monsters. Let our search for "Horzasha" begin!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and up Memory: 500 MB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 860 MB available space Additional Notes: Broadband only required if enabling developer analytics.
